application_type_full: Approval of details reserved by a condition (discharge)
description: Details of an enhanced sound insulation value pursuant to condition 11 of planning application reference: 240014VAR dated 24.04.2024 'Application for a Minor Material Amendment (S73.a) to vary condition 2 (approved plans) of planning permission ref: 221931FUL dated 20/12/2023 for: Conversion of existing ground & first floor flats into five self-contained residential units; single storey rear extension; alteration of roof from hip to gable end; installation of four roof lights to front roof slope; side and rear elevation dormer roof extensions to rear main and outrigger roofslopes; associated refuse storage and cycle parking. Amendment seeks to increase the depth of the rear ground floor extension to improve the internal layout and provide an additional bedspace for the rear ground floor unit 2.'
